I am gonna keep this review simple.  If you like these, try the Exofficio Give N Go Sport Mesh.  They have more room for your junk, if you have more up front there that requires it.  I find them much more comfortable but still enjoy these.I wear a Large size.  I am  6'6" 235lbs with a 36 pant size.

I am gonna keep it short and sweet.  These are my favorite boxer briefs.  These are more comfortable than the Exofficio Give n GO without the sport mesh.  These feel like they have a bigger pocket in the front for your junk, especially useful for those who may need the room.  They fit nice and snug.I am 6'6" and weight 235lbs.  A Large size fits well. These are my favorite boxer briefs and I will give you a list of which fit me best in order in case you are a similar body size.1. Exofficio Give N Go Sport Mesh2. Saxx Vibe3. Duluth Trading Company Bare Naked4. Exofficio Give N Go5. MyPakage Weekday

I received this watch from Burei about a week ago.  I was surprised at just how well the watch was packaged.  The box it came in is very fancy and the watch was wrapped around a jewelry pillow giving it a very high end feel.  At this sub 40 dollar price range, I was not expecting to see anything like that.The watch itself has a polished stainless steel bland that is very classy and elegant.  So far the band has resisted scratches well.  The front of the dial contains an elegant black face with chrome markings to indicated time.  The date is displayed in a white rotary dial and can be displayed in both english and spanish according to the instructions.According to the listing, the watch has a Miyota quartz movement which is a very accurate way of maintaining time in wrist watches. It is a proven method and used by some very well known brands of watches.Also the dial is water resistant up to 100ft which will provide peace of mind for most users who are concerned about contact with water.  The watch states it comes with a 2 year warranty and a 30 day money back satisfaction guarantee.I received this product for testing and review purposes.

My wife is a marathon runner and was excited when this product arrived. Upon opening the product she immediately noticed it didnt get as small as she needed, she is a waist size 22-24. So in turn I had to use the product as I have a waist size of 36.  Once I put the belt on, I filled the bottles with water and took a run with my wife.The greatest feature I feel is that the inside of the runners belt has an anti slip layer.  Its sort of a grippy rubber/silicone that will hold onto your body or clothing which prevents the belt from bouncing or riding up while you run.  All my previous belts suffer from that so this feature makes the belt stand out.I currently use a LG G3 phone in a large bulky Otterbox type case.  The case I use is called a Ballistic SG Case.  My phone easily fit in the pouch.  Also inside the pouch is a clip for your house key.  One thing I will recommend is washing out the bottles prior to using, I do this will all new products.Other than that, this is a great product that is very well made and thought out.  The belt did not budge during my 3 mile run.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

We received this product a few days ago. The product itself came in an unmarked box making receiving an item of this nature discreet.  Inside the shipping box, came another box, this one with the product itself.  The packaging for the product is very well made and makes gifting or gag gifting a product like this ideal.The product itself seems to be well constructed.  The included remote will need 2 AAA batteries to operate.  At first I thought our product was dead on arrival, but I looked and saw the battery was not making good contact and adjust one of the springs and the device worked fine.  There are multiple speed and pulse settings you can select by pressing a button on the remove.  The plug portion of the toy seems soft, and appears to be well made as well.  Be sure to use a water based lubricant on silicone toys.  Overall a very well made product.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

Great set of pruning shears. My wife and I have found ourselves gardening more this year. We used these shears on our Rose bushes, rasberry bushes and some clematis. We had zero difficulty cutting through any stems or branches with these. The cuts were smooth and did not damage the plant any more than needed during the cut. Our old shears would fray the stems when cutting flowers as they werent sharp enough to cut through.These shears have the ability to be stored closed so to avoid any possible injury from the sharp blades. I ran my finger along the shears when they were closed and it does a good job and hiding the blade to prevent accidental cuts to fingers if placed in a toolbox with other small tools. The grips on the shears are rubberized and prevent any slippage and gives you good grip to make a cut cleanly. Overall these are high quality shears that operate with ease and little force needed.Product received for testing and review purposes.

I received this product for my wife about 3 weeks ago now.  It came in a well packaged box and immediately I began assembling it.  Instructions were clear and thorough and all necessary tools are provided for assembly.  Assembly itself probably took me around 15 minutes.  While I was putting everything together, every pieces I touched made me certain that this was a well built product, and a product that can withstand years of use.The reason behind wanted a device such as this was for my wife while she worked.  My wife is a highly active person, and she just recently obtained a desk job that requires her to be seated in front of a computer for the entire day.  She was getting restless and fidgety and needed some way to expend some energy.  This is where the FitDesk comes in.After assembly, I actually packed up the FitDesk and drove it up to surprise my wife.  When I started going into her office, everyone there started looking at me really strangely.  I arrived at my wifes desk and to she immediately got excited to try it out.  She placed it under her desk, locked her wheeled desk chair into the included chair lock on the elliptical and started to exercise.The elliptical itself is EXTREMELY quiet.  If you have a cubicle or whatever, you will not disturb anyone else around you.  We have not encountered any squeaking yet over 3 weeks, but I informed my wife that if it does squeak, just spray some wd40 near the wheels. My wife averages about 250 calories burned a day on this elliptical and she is just ecstatic.  Her knees do not hit the desk, changing resistance is easily done with her feet.  This is a superbly thought out product and the build quality is fantastic.My wife was so happy with her new FitDesk Elliptical, we actually started telling all of our friends on our various forums and facebook running groups.  A lot of people have asked questions and a couple have actually purchased this product based upon our experiences.  They have both written to us thanking us for providing them with an honest opinion.  Out of all the products I have tested here on Amazon, I can easily say that the FitDesk is the best product to date.This product was received for testing and review purposes.

So I recently lost some weight and was actually needing to get a new wedding band, as my original Tungsten ring was too large.  Tungsten is a strong metal that cannot be resized.  My original ring came from a local jewelry store, and we paid about 275 dollars for it.  I decided to try some alternatives and they did not disappoint.The ring obtained from MNH were of equal quality to the one I had purchased at a big box store for almost 30x the price.  The ring is 8mm in width and has a comfort band.  If anyone is in the market for a wedding band, I strongly urge no matter which ring you choose, get a comfort band.  It is so much more comfortable on your hand than any other style.I have been wearing the ring for about 2 weeks now.  I work with my hands and do not see any scratches at all on the finish of the ring.  I have very sensitive skin and I have had no reaction at all to the materials used in this ring.  I highly recommend this product as the fit and finish is exceptional.  This is one of the few companies that gives a no questions asked 30 day return policy.Product was obtained for testing and review purposes.

I received the 12 Liter version about 2 weeks ago.  This unit will store about 3 gallons of water which is a good amount for a family of 4. Upon opening the filtration system from its package, you really can sense this is a high quality product.  Included instructions are very clear and well written. Setting up the Lifestraw filtration system is easy as well.  You simply have to find a source of water, ideally the cleanest water available to you at any given point.  Fill up the bag, roll it, seal it and then hang the bag.The next thing you do is attach the hoses.  You then allow some water to escape/purge from the red colored valve which is going to be the polluted/unfiltered water, remember red means stop.  You then wait until you see water coming from the blue valve which will be your clean filtered water.  This is the water you are able to drink. When you are done, you can roll up your filtration system and store it in the included carrying bag.This system is a top of the line gravity fed filtration system.  If you plan on hiking long distance in the wild, oftentimes it is too burdensome or impossible to carry enough supplies with you to last your entire trip.  I know I am going to gift this to a family member who is planning on taking on the Appalachian trail within the year. I will update this review to reflect upon how well this product helped him during his bucket list challenge.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

My wife received these earrings about a week ago.  We were very happy upon opening the package and seeing these.  The earrings themselves arrived in a small black jewelry box that makes gifting simple.  The outside covering is a nice suede/velvet type covering that gives it a nice touch.  Also included inside the package is a microfiber cleaning cloth that will allow you to keep the earrings looking new.The earrings themselves seem of good quality.  My wife really loved the violet color.  It is a unique design of the cube that accentuates the violet and makes the earrings flashy.  They are comfortable to wear and my wifes ear did not turn colors etc.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

I received this bottle opener about a week ago.  Upon removing it from the box, I was a bit skeptical on how well this opener would work.  While examining the product, it basically is just a plastic covering with an enclosed magnet that will catch the cap once you pop it off.I tried it first on my Mexican Coca Cola bottles.  The cap came off really easy and attached to the magnet.  I then proceeded to try it on some of my apple ciders.  Each time I used it, the cap came off on the first try and the cap was caught by the bottle openers magnet.  It really is a neat little gadget and it can make a great stocking stuffer.Now I do not know if this really could replace a wall mounted bottle opener, as that is the easiest of all openers to use. You simply walk up with one hand, insert your bottle, and pop the top off.  What I think the next step for this product should be would be to design a wall mounted version, that will collect the caps as you pop them off.  That is my holy grail.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

I received this thermal mug about a week ago.  Immediately upon opening the box, you could tell this was a quality product.  The only part of the mug I didn't like was the handle, I think it is a bit thin and awkward to hold.  A wider/thicker handle would provide a better grip and make it more comfortable to hold.The mug itself is constructed of stainless steel.  The manufacturer does not list if this is dishwasher safe, so I have been hand washing my mug to ensure longevity. The mug itself is double walled, but I am not sure if it is vacuumed like a thermos or not.  Either way it does allow my beverage to stay cold longer.  I do not have a timeframe that says how much longer it kept it cold.  Overall a good product with room for improvement.  I gave the product 4 stars and it would easily be 5 stars with a better handle.Product was obtained for testing and review purposes.

I received this item about 2 weeks ago and finally got  a chance to use it.  It is really easy to install, you simply slide it over the umbrella pole and it adjusts to fit the size of the pole.  The unit is plenty bright, I do wish it allowed you to aim the lights that shine down.The light comes with 4 rechargeable batteries that powers the LED bulbs.  The great thing about LED is it doesnt attract as many bugs as our old lights did.  There arent as many moths etc flying at these lights.  I would rate the color of these lights around 3500-4000k, so your average LED light output.  It isnt a soft white, more of a white so it isnt really a soft white light.Overall the light worked well, recharging was simple and I would recommend this as an affordable lighting solution for your patio table at night.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

I have recently gone on a kick to review a bunch of bluetooth speakers. For listening at work and at home while cleaning/showering,  This speaker gets plenty loud. All the devices tested (LG Optimus G Pro, Kindle Fire HD, Samsung S5) all found and connected via bluetooth seamlessly to the speaker. The whole process took 10 seconds or less for each device.The sound that is delivered is clear, crisp and full. I listen to alot of 80's pop/rock and punk while my wife listens to Country. All genres sounded good, but we do not listen to rap so I do not know if that would sound as good or not. The volume buttons are great, and the ability to answer calls is a huge plus. There is no obnoxious tone while it connects via bluetooth so using the speaker while at work is ok as well. The look and feel of the speaker is real nice too. The design is sleek and modern.  Battery life has been great and the fact it resists water is a huge plus. Charging is nice and simple, comes with the necessary usb power cord. I recieved this item for testing and review purposes.

Just like another reviewer, I also had an opportunity to review the EcoGreen storage space saver product, which were storage bags that did not require a pump but instead you rolled them to get the air out.  I was then contacted to see if I was willing to try these bags that come with a hand pump to extract all the air out of the storage bags.The bags I received were of high quality.  They all worked properly and they were nice and thick.  What I did prior to pumping the air out was to squeeze as much as out as I could by hand, this should save on the effort required to use the pump to get the rest out.  Another review advised that because they were over 50, it became burdensome to pump so many time.  I implore them to try to roll or squeeze as much air out prior to pumping, it should cut the effort in half or more.Overall these are a high quality storage item at a great price.This product was received for testing and review purposes.

I have been using this knife set for the past week.  I am extremely pleased with the quality of this set.  All knives feel well balanced and feel high quality.  Included in the set is as follows:-8-inch chef's knife-8-inch carving knife-8-inch bread knife-5-inch santoku knife-5-inch utility knife-3-inch paring knife-cutting shears with soft grip-6 steak knives- wood knife blockThis is a great entry to intermediate set of knives.  My everyday set of knives cost 3x the amount these go for and I cannot tell any difference in the weight, feel, or cutting ability between the two sets.  I am not a chef, but I do cut alot of meat and veggies as we cook at home daily. I have used the set to cut through Sirloin Tip Roasts and have had no issue doing so.Overall this is a nice, high quality knife set that comes bundled with everything you need to start your kitchen out with.Product was received at a discount for testing and review purposes.

I received this speaker about two weeks ago and just recently began to use it. When I first opened the box, the speaker had a nice shiny, black color. The speaker is very lightweight, and is constructed of a plastic surround. I did like the fact that the speaker has an actual button to turn the speaker on and off specifically dedicated for that function. Also on the top, there is a play/pause button, and a volume button. All the buttons feel nice and solid to the touch. The sound of the speaker is good. It competes with many speakers around its price range. The one area that I feel the speaker lacks in is having any discernible bass. The speaker is nice and clear though and makes up for it in that respect.Bluetooth pairing was extremely simple, probably took about 6 seconds for my phone to locate the device. During playback, there was no dropped bluetooth connection while using my LG G3 while playing Pandora/Amazon Music. Battery life is pretty good too, lasting around 5-6 hours of playback on high volume. I did walk into other rooms with my phone, around 20-30 feet away without any dropout or disconnecting from the bluetooth. So the bluetooth strength is good.The compact form and the clear mids/highs gives this speaker a 4.5 rating. If there was a way to get this speaker a little increase in bass, the speaker would easily be a 5. As it stands its a solid contender in an extremely competitive small speaker market.Product was received for testing and review purposes

My wife and I received this set about a week ago now.  We have opened 4 bottles up to this point and the process has been simple.  Both products seem to be of high quality, although I have had other foil cutters that last a short while, so the verdict is still out on the foil cutter.  Both products arrived in a nice display type box that I am using on top of my wine hutch.  It is a nice black box with subtle wine red lettering.In order to use the set, we first used the foil cutter and cut open the foil, which allows you to expose the cork.  We then placed the bottle opener on top of the wine bottle and pressed in the handles on the wine opener.  We then pulled down the lever which causes the cork to become punctured thus allowing an easy removal of said cork. You simply pull up on the lever and the cork pops out.  It truly is a simple way to open a bottle.This set is a great gift set as well due to the fact it comes in such a nice box.  Makes gifting it alot easier for those you know who love the finer things in life.  Overall a great product.  Wine opener is great and the foil cutter is on par with other cutters I have used in the past.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

I received this camera a week or so ago. I have used many different types of IP cameras in the past and consider myself to be experienced in the use of this type of camera. The first thing I noticed when I opened the package was that I really enjoyed the sleek black look of this camera. It really enables you to place it someplace without sticking out like a sore thumb.Included in the package is the IP Camera, mounting hardware, the power cord, a usb cord,  and an instruction booklet. The setup of this camera is extremely similar to other types of IP cameras. There is an app available to view this camera via your smartphone which is how I set this camera up. Once the app was downloaded, the setup process took me about 8-10 minutes to have the camera live and to have it setup where I wanted the camera to record. I liked that this camera will actually notify you via email when there is motion or sound detected within the selected field of view.The quality of the image is very good as well. In normal light situations, the images appear clear and the ability to see what you are looking at is extremely easy. Night vision also provides a good image. While it isnt as detailed as the normal light conditions, it still allows you to see facial features if someone happened into the field of view. I would say a safe night vision distance for facial recognition would be 15-25ft max.The ability to pan and tilt via the smartphone app is a great feature. I have been looking into the possibility of paying for an app that actually will store recorded images offsite just in case I were ever to need "evidence" for something that occurred in my home.I have over 100/25 Mbps download/upload internet speed, but still experience artifact and lag issues at times. Granted lag/artifact can be present on all brands of IP Cameras, I just wish someone could solve the issue and allow a more fluid pan/tilt feature Other than this issue, the camera has functioned well and has provided me with the ability to see my home while away from home. Its a means to peace of mind and safety.Item provided for testing and review.

Great baby doll made of an extremely soft material.  It isn't made as durable as the ones from the big box store but it is only 20 percent of the price as well. The breast cutouts will fit all ranges of breast sizes.  The included thong is sexy and comfortable as well.  Probably one of my favorite outfits for my wife.

Extremely stretchy material.  Comes in a small package but really stretches well for a one size fits all.  The fishnet is extremely soft and comfortable  unlike many others which can be coarse and rough on your skin.  Extremely sexy for in the bedroom or even beachwear.

Product fit perfect for my wife.  The material is extremely stretchy and should fit most people comfortably. When taking it out of the packaging,  I was a bit skeptical that it would stretch as much as it did.The material seems to be made of a high quality fishnet that isn't abrasive to wear.  Some fishnet is extremely coarse but this one is comfortable.

I received this wallet about a week ago for my wife.  Upon opening it we were excited as the wallet felt really nice, like a high quality wallet.  The one touch of the exterior we didn't like was the big gold badge with the company name on the wallet.  Maybe a lower corner logo or the like would make the wallets appearance that much better.With this being a RFID blocking wallet, I expected that the wallet may be heavier than normal.  You really cannot discern any difference from a non RFID wallet, to this wallet that has the ability to block it. Inside of the wallet, there are various pockets.  We love the number of pockets that are available to store cash, cards and other goodies.  The thing we didn't like was the material that was used inside the wallet, it was the reason why I dropped the star. Its almost like a vinyl type material that holds all of the cards.  It would be so much better if the wallet actually was made with the same exterior material on the inside.  It would feel more high quality and probably be more durable.We like the fact that it zips up to protect your items.  Other than the few areas I hope to see improvement in, this is a really good wallet for a low price that will protect your cards from being attacked.  Wallet was provided to me for testing and review purposes and I strive to be extremely honest in my reviews.  I would rate this product 3.5 stars to which I rounded up and chose 4 stars.

I received this money clip earlier this week.  It came exactly as pictured in the listing.  The money clip is extremely light weight, due to the fact it is constructed of Titanium.  It really looks good while holding my money secure.I have been hold a drivers license, a debit card and on any given day between 4-6 different bills of money.  The clip has retained its strength and has held my items tightly and securely.  The bottle opener is a really nice addition to the piece. It doesn't take any strength away or detract from the aesthetics of the clip.Overall a very nice budget friendly money clip.  Item was provided to me for testing and review purposes.

2:38 MinsThis is really a terrific power washer.  I received the power washer extremely quickly after ordering directly from Powerhouse.  Assembly of the unit was easily achieved and the included instructions made assembly and operation easy.  As you can see in the video, I put this power washer to the test.  I used it on my extremely dirty patio that is filled with mildew and dirt from years of abuse.  This patio has never been power washed, yet this electric power washer cut through the grime and made my patio appear new.Also in the video you will see me using it on my siding.  The siding was dirty and when the water is rushing off of my siding, you can literally see black water sliding down the house as all the dirt is swept away.  It knocked old leaves, spider webs and general gunk off of my home with easy.  The ability adjust the pressure on the nozzle was awesome allowing me to ensure my siding would not be damaged.This power washer does come with a spinning patio cleaner.  Seeing that my patio was never cleaned in the 20 years I have lived there, I needed the strongest stream of water to clean off the patio.  The adjustable nozzle changes the stream of water from a wide fan to a narrow stream of water.  The handle is a foldable handle and a soap bottle is included to attach and spray soap on say a deck or even the siding.  All you would have to do is simply attach the soap dispenser and turn the tab to on.  You can then turn it to off but continue to use the power washer without the need to disconnect it.  It really is a great system and it is quite powerful for being run off electric.Overall this is an extremely high quality power washer.  If I had one complaint is that the base of the power washer is quite narrow, so the unit tips over quite easily while you are moving around and reach the end of the hose line.  If there was a way to balance it a bit better, this would improve an already exceptional product.This product was received in exchange for my testing and reviewing purposes.

With the even more recent events unfolding in the news, I decided it was time to get a second dash cam to protect my family and myself. There is no better witness out there than video evidence. I am glad I did, I now have an extra set of eyes that records every move and can prove my version of events if ever needed. When opening the box, you can expect to find an array of things such as: The Dash Cam itself, a suction mount, USB cable for charging, USB cable with 12v outlet for power while in your vehicle, and a 16gb kingston micro SD card. .The camera itself is alot smaller than I imagined it from the pictures on Amazon. It basically sits in the palm of your hand which is great because it doesnt obstruct your view while on the windshield recording. The camera itself barely weighs anything and is easily held in place by the included suction cup. When you have the camera plugged in via the included 12v power cord, the camera will turn on when the vehicle ignition is turned on and turn off when the ignition is turned off. This makes it easy and effortless to record your video. Daytime recording is very clear and it is easy to make out the license plates of the vehicles in front of you. Nighttime driving is slightly grainy, but all of these night vision cameras have this same downside.Overall this camera is an excellent product that should provide video recording for many years to come. I havent found any issues to date with the camera and operation has been flawless over the past week.  I have not attempted the GPS as I didnt want the additional cord run along my dash. I have looked at various videos to check on the quality and it has all been consistently good. One last note is you can set your segments on the recording to 3 minutes, 5 minutes or 10 minute loops. This means the video will be saved in these increments making finding what you need alot easier. Again, a great product that I received directly from Black Box in exchange for an honest review.

I received the Black Box F1S 1080P dashboard dash camera about a week ago.  I immediately took it out of the box and foudn it came with the camera itself,  a micro USB cable, a windshield suction mount, a micro usb cable with adapter for the car,  a gps antenna, and the instructions.The reason for the 4 star rating is the fact it did not come with a SD card and required the end user to purchase it.  I have sampled other dash cams that include the card at a comparable price.The camera itself is extremely simple to use.  The first thing I did was clean my windshield to ensure a nice clean surface to adhere to.  I attached the mount and camera.  The hardest thing I did was make a run up to the top of my headliner, ran the cord down the passenger A pillar, and then ran it under the dash to a cigarrette outlet to provide power.  I wish there was an easier way to run a power source, but that will be the most challenging aspect to mounting a dash cam.  Once that is done, everything else is easy.Picture quality wise, this little camera is very good.  Night vision is on par with other dash cams I have tried.  It becomes difficult to read plate numbers more than a car lengths away, but that is the normal limitations of these types of cameras. You can select how many minute loop time you would like, I normally choose 3 or 5 minute intervals.  I always keep the resolution set at its highest and it averages just about 10gb every hour.  On a 32gb sd card, you will have around 3 hours of video.The camera does has an option to replay video on the screen.  This is useful if you were in an automobile accident and a police officer would like to view the accident itself.  The screen is 2.7 inches but it is clear and you can see the video on demand.  There is an auto off and auto on mode where the camera while plugged into the DC power will power itself on and off when the ignition is turned on.Overall a very good dashcam at a good price.  I would prefer if it shipped with either a 16-32gb sd card as they cost very little and the camera requires one to operate.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

I have been playing with this camera for a little over a week now.  It is a really good camera for an extraordinary price when you compare it with the big box store model that is very popular, its barely a fraction of the price. The camera came boxed in packaging that would make it stand out on any shelf, it actually is really nice packaging. While unpacking, you will find the camera, some accessories like mounts/arms/stands, a case which is waterproof, instructions and the USB Cable.The camera itself is really easy to use.  Its very small and weights around 2 ounces making it easy to bring everywhere you need it.  There are only a couple buttons on the camera itself making operation simplified for people of all age groups.  The software on the camera is pretty good and playback is easily achieved but difficult to view on the smallish screen.I read on a previous review about which memory card to buy.  I found a 32gb Samsung Class 10 card on sale for 17 dollars at a big box store.  I have been using that card without issue.  Video records well and I have not lost any footage that I have recorded.  Video quality is very good as well, motion shots have turned out with minimal blur.  Microphone quality is average, and some wind noise should be expected.Overall a great camera considering the price point.  I was provided the camera for testing and review purposes.

I received the InaRock 2-in-1 Solar Powered LED Landscape Light a few days ago. I do have a few other solar lights that I have purchased for almost double the price and this is equal to the quality of those found in the Orange colored big box store. This light has an output of 200 lumens through the use of 4  LED bulbs. The best part of this light is that it is solar powered so there is no continuous cost of batteries like in other lights or the need to run wiring.Inside the box is everything you need to operate the light.  There are two mounting options, a ground stake, and screws for mounting it elsewhere.  I used it with the ground stake and have it aimed up on a white birch trunk.  It works really well for this purpose.  The one thing I was really hoping for was the ability to maybe have a cord to run the solar panel a few feet away enabling me to place it in an area that may not get direct sunlight.Overall this is a great light and I highly recommend it up to this point.Product was received for testing and review purposes.

i noticed this set available from several vendors- found it for $15 here while other vendors were selling for $20 +@ $3 per piece- you can't go wrong.  i've only had to cut 1 thing since receiving- so i can tell u that they slice up Mrs Prindables caramel apples quite nicely- plus the apple doesn't turn brown from being sliced by a metal blade.the blade is obviously ceramic- the handle is a hard plastic with a rubberized coating- which makes it feel almost like silicone & helps with grip.the peeler has a ceramic blade- but the frame around it is plastic- i can imagine that plastic frame cracking/breaking pretty easily- time & use will tell.very sharp- so u will need to store in the included sheaths- & be careful when using.  ceramic chips/cracks/snaps- so don't use knife to pry things apart/openalso surprised by how nice it was packaged- a great box with high density foam cut outs to fit each knife/peeler.  sturdy cardboard with a magnetic seal.  if you're crafty- you can remove the foam & cover the box with paper/fabric & have a nice storage box with magnetic closure.i didn't know about the ez way to open it & tore the opposite end open b4 i realized an ez grip & flip would have opened the top of the box.i include pics for u_ i hope my shopping experience helps in your shopping decision- thanks

this is well made.  solid & a good amount of padding- comes with a couple of mounts to attach at end.it arrived in a box & also included a bag to store it in & a strap.i paid $16- 10 days later i see it's $12_ lots of vendors are selling same things for lots more money- so make sure to look around for good price.there's a knob to turn to lock the brace in any position that fits your body best.  it's pretty comfortable-- very light.i include some pics- i hope my shopping experience helps you in making your shopping decision-- thanks

Dole Pineapple packed in juice is the absolute best i've ever had.  i've tried other brands & they are usually hard & tasteless- unlike Dole which is always soft & sweet.these 8 ounce cans of chunks are the perfect size to snack on. they say this is 2 servings at 70 calories per serving. 1 serving has 25% of daily vitamin c.this is a product of Thailand. for recipe ideas visit dole dot com.they have a satisfaction guarantee_ 1-800-232-8888i ordered end of Sept 2015 & use by date is April 2018_ 2 years & 7 months shelf life.  i ordered 48 cans- had i known it would have such a long shelf life i would have ordered more- cause i got them on sale at $6 for 12 cans.i highly recommend Dole pineapple- stock up when the price is right.i include some photos & hope that my shopping experience helps you in making your decision- thanks

3:16 Mins hi there-i ordered 2 of these- i uploaded a video so u can see how they arrive & what you're getting-  were only $7 each when i ordered-these are smart chargers- they guarantee not to over charge your device & to charge your device at the safest, fastest rate capable.these are 20 watt & 4 amp_ i'm not a tekkie_ so in the vid i said each port was 2 amp_ BUT i read the fine print on the plug- & the top charging amp is actually 2.4_ but still can't go over 4 total.  so that basically means you can charge a tablet & a phone.  cause if one port is juicing you up at 2.4 amp then the other port can't give  you more than 1.6 amp...definitely faster than generic $5 wall chargers.because of the smart technology- PowerIQ is what Anker calls it- you don't have to worry about which port to plug the phone in & which port to plug the tablet in--- this is smart- so it figures that out for U & charges accordinglyi was impressed with the packaging & informational inserts_ they pretty much guarantee your satisfaction  if you're not- they include their phone # & email address so you can contact them.what if your phone/device is only 1 amp- will this burn it up ?  no it won't-  it will only supply the maximum charge current allowed by your phone/device- up to 2.4 amps.these are small enough for you to keep 1 in your purse/pocket_ in the desk drawer at work_in the glove box- if u can get them for $7 i'd buy a few & share with your friends & family.  a lot of the 4 & 5 port smart chargers were $20-ish_ so i decided to go with 2 separate units with 2 ports- so that i can leave 1 in the kitchen & 1 in the bedroom_ plus it was less expensive- $14 for two 2-port chargers.i hope that my shopping experience helps u with your shopping choices_ thanks

updated/edit_9-12-2015pepsi left a message for me in the comments_ i called them_ they apologized & sent me coupons for free pepsi products as compensation_i was pleasantly surprised that such a large company with so many products would make an effort to reach out to me & make things right.even though i did not like the cherry dew_ i love pepsi customer relations_ & i did find a way to enjoy the flat soda- i poured it into popsicle molds & froze_ it makes great popsicles- which makes sense- since it taste like a melted frozen slush/slurpee when it's liquid.I never thought that i'd HATE a soda with the name Mountain Dew_ cause i love the regular flavor Mountain Dew-so i assumed this was that Mountain Dew but with a splash of cherry....because on the label it says_ "Dew with a Blast of Citrus Cherry Flavor"But this is not Dew- it doesn't even have orange juice in it- which is the 2nd ingredient listed on the regular Mountain Dew label.so what does it taste like ?  a melted Slurpee/slushy-  a frozen cherry slushy/Slurpee that's melted-& nowhere on the ingredient list is the ingredient cherry listed--- so it's NOT Mnt Dew & it's not real cherry- it's just gross.i received my case in August 2015 & the 'use by date' is September 2015_(see pics)_  so there was no carbonation- a few bubbles when you pour it over ice- but no bubbly, effervescent, fizzy  when you drink it..now i know why it was on sale- cause it's awful & was 1 month away from expiration date.i've posted some pics with 'use by' date & the label that says this soda is dew with a blast of cherry- which it wasn't.i do not recommend- if my experience was any help in your decision to buy or not buy- plz check the box saying so- thnx !

they sell a version of this on qvc for $20 plus s/h.  this has metal ring & screw - the plate that sticks to phone is plastic- but it's very sticky & once placed it's very sturdy/secure.  just make sure you stick it against a clean/flat surface of the phone or case.the 'ring'/circle part folds flat & u can twist/turn it so that you can hold ur phone @ any angle.-  i ordered 2 @ $3-ish each_ i'd definitely recommend & will probably get more for self & to give as gifts.. i've been using 1 of them on the case housing my Amazon Fire phone- & it's not falling off & i feel more secure while holding/carrying it.for the couple $ it cost U should try it- order a couple/few- cause you'll want 2 share- &/or put 1 on all of ur cases... mine came from china so it wasn't 2 day shipping- but it probably came in 10 days-2 weeks max.- the 2 i ordered came in separate plastic cases, mailed in a bubble/padded envelope.i'll post some pics so you can see it on the case- see the sticky part- see the ring/loop (which is metal-sturdy-solid) in different positions & angles- u can also use it as a stand to set ur phone/tablet on a table for watching movies/readingif what i shared helps in your decision to try/buy or not to try/buy_ plz click the button that says so-  thnx !

This was an intimate look into the lives of a married couple on a weekend that a mutual college 'friend' joins them for the weekend- the mutual friend brings his 'girlfriend'?.- they rediscover past attractions/passions- (&the wife discovers a new passion)_& give each other permission to act on them.-U think U know who is gonna couple up but u may be surprised.Michael Knowles is the actor who plays husband, David_ the multi-talented man also wrote & directed this movie.the writing & directing was top shelf for an independent movie- & as good or better than any made for tv movie._ his acting was ok on the more somber tones- but he wasn't able to as convincingly express his joy/passion quite as well as the somber tones/moods._ a good job though..Kathleen Wise played wife, Julie_ she was magnificent- the obvious stand out in the ensemble.  she's beautiful, graceful, expressive- you so get what she's feeling by just a flick of her eyes or hand movements or one of her many expressive facial smiles/smirk/frown/brow lift/tone of voice/ etc._as obvious proof of this- look for the 2 shower scenes- in the 1st it's just her in the shower while her hubby casually chats with her_ the 2nd shower scene is pretty much the same- but she's feeling guilty about something- u can tell she's feeling guilty about something- u can tell w/o her uttering a word-Monique Zordan played Catherine, the mutual friends's girlfriend_ a free spirit who says what she means & does what she wants- not enough in your face to make you uncomfortable- but just the right amount to remain likable_ actress has a great name too- Monique Zordan- exotic.she does a scene wearing just bikini bottoms- & she is beautiful & perky.Jilon Vanover played the married couples mutual friend (& more?) from college, Marc_  he's handsome & convincing as the less responsible friend with no true commitments in his life_ when he introduces Catherine as his girlfriend she is surprised by it- like it was news to her- but she lets Marc let his married friends believe that she was his girlfriend- cause she's cool that way.. out of the 4 main characters - i think he's the least convincing maybe slightly less talented actor- but he  gets the job done & doesn't detract from the other performers.so Kathleen & David (married) & Marc all went to college 2gether_ there was more than friendship between all 3 of them.- in 2's or 3's, i don't know.- when your watching this your 1st instinct is to think that maybe the wife & the college buddy are thinking about revisiting their college passion.- & maybe the college buddy's girlfriend is making moves on the husband.... but that may not be as it seems- or it may be- but there's also more.DON'T read on if U don't want SPOILERS_-----the husband sees his wife in their bed with 1 of the weekend guests.  the girlfriend prances around the pool topless in front of the husband.  the wife sees her husband making out with 1 of the weekend guests- she came in just in time to prevent her husband from receiving some good oral sex. the husband is kissed in the kitchen by 1 of the weekend guests. plus there are some more incidents- there's even some humor- the husband secretly saw his wife receiving oral sex from 1 of the guests- when the husband talks to that guest- he asks if they've had anything to eat-  the guest says no- even though the guest just ate out his wife's *ussy.if you've got Amazon Prime- u can watch the movie twice- & once you know who's with who- u catch a lot more of the clues & hidden/double meanings.the married couple may have decided to give each other permission to act on their passions for the weekend guests-  is it guy/girl_ guy/guy_girl/girl_guy/girl/guy_ or a 4 way orgy ??  you're gonna have to watch to find out....i hope my comments help u decide to watch or not watch this movie- if so- plz click the button that says so- thnx !

1:25 Mins not really a review of phone- but sharing some helpful info with you_ there are lots of reviews & not much helpful info.for instance- lots of people are hating on the Fire phone cause they can't get Google Play apps or Services___well my info will tell you how you can_Love the phone_ cause it only cost me $100-ish _ I would have renewed my Amazon Prime membership soon- & buying phone comes with 1 year of Amazon Prime Service- worth $100-ish_ if U are not up for renewal you can still get the extra year added anytime_ so get it while amazon is offering the free year of Prime_ i'd also wait for the phone to go down to $200-ish_ they lower the price every now & then to between $190-$230It works with T-Mobile $30 month plan that includes 100 minutes of talk, unlimited text & unlimited data- first 5GB at 4G speed.got the sim kit at walmart website. for $30 i got the micro-sim, activation & 1st month of service._ i went to the website to set up account & choose the plan & activate sim card-  you put in sim # & some numbers on Fire phone_ it was pretty simple_ phone was set up with talk/text/data & activated in less than 1/2 hour.you have to go into setting & allow non-amazon apps to be installed_ amazon does not advise this_ & U do this at your own risk_ you may screw up phone if you do it wrong.  it worked on mine- but i can't guarantee that it will work on yours_ INSTALL NON AMAZON APPS AT YOUR OWN RISKEDIT_& it worked  !!  5-23-2015- i didn't have to turn off/on or root or reboot_ after installing i was asked to create a new or sign into active google account- i signed into my current google account on the screen/prompt that was on my Fire phone_ & then everything went just like when you sign in to google when setting up any new android device.Installation order revised - tested and working on my factory reset 4.6.1:1)Google Account Manager (might say log-in manager/service), 2)Google Play Services, 3)Google Services Framework, finally  4)Google Play Store.i got most updated apk's at AndroidCowboy's website_towards bottom of page there's a section titled 'apps for kindle fire'. ( if you search his website there are ways to get google on 8.9" Fire Hd tablet w/o rooting & w/rooting)androidcowboy(dot)com/android-apk-files-download/----i had to write 'dot' instead of putting a period/dot cause amazon doesn't like outside web addresses in comments.i used amazon browser on Fire phone. i downloaded 1st apk file_ then tilted phone to right so left panel slides out_you'll see 'downloads' there_the silk browser has a downloads folder built in so no need to install a file app or create new folders__ i clicked on the apk_ follow instructions that pop up on screen. when installation is done you can delete the apk_ that way you don't get confused about what apk download to choose after you download the 2nd apk--i downloaded the 2nd apk- followed instructions on screen- download 3rd apk- followed instructions on screen- then 4th apk- followed prompts on screen.-Then the Google sign in appeared on the display- i signed in with my gmail address & password & then everything worked._there is also a 5 minute video on youtube that helped-go to youtube & search for:Install Google Playstore on Amazon Fire PhoneJ. WilliamsThere are also lots of helpful vids on YouTube that shows you how to use phone- it's ez to search YouTube vids.---if any of this info was helpful in your decision - to get the phone or not- to install Google Play or not_ please click on button that says 'helpful'thanks

If you're looking for instructions/guide/hints_ do a search for abcarverpro guide _dot_comsome high lights if you want to know some of what you'll find_ some of what you need to know to effectively use this:The Ab Carver Pro has many modifications; like the one on its rolling function. The spring like mechanism, known as the carbon steel coil, installed in this equipment will create a resistance. That’s where you’re really working those ab muscles. When you roll back, it provides assistance.This workout can be a bit strenuous if you’ve never tried it before. That’s ok. Go easy on yourself. Your body needs some time to get accustomed to this workout. So if you’re a beginner, intermediate or advanced, there’s a different rolling plan for each:For beginners:If you’re a beginner, position yourself about 12-15 inches against the wall, and roll out against it.  The wall will act as a blockade, so that your rolling is controlled. Your thigh area should be approximately 65-70 degrees against the floor. By doing so, you’re allowing yourself to understand the movement and exercise.For intermediary:At intermediary level, there is no such need to use the wall as a barrier. Roll out a little further than the beginners’ level, with your thighs about 45 degrees against the floor.For advanced:This is a pro position. If you’ve worked with an ab wheel for some time now, then this is the position you should be going for. For the advanced level, roll against the floor.Based on the level you’re rolling at, roll forward and backward; 5 seconds to roll forward and 5 seconds to roll back.Step 4: Rolling left and rightNow that you’ve understood the rolling, let’s move on. Continue the same movement in step 3. Use the handle to maneuver the grip to the left and right by placing pressure downwards. The wide wheel of the Ab Carver Pro and the coil system will allow an easier turn, without putting added pressure on your lower back.This position of alternating between forward, left and right will exercise your obliques.Step 5: Pace yourselfIf this is your first time, carve about 10 repetitions or “reps”; that is 5 left and 5 right. Remember, this exercise is not about how fast you can accomplish a certain round; it’s about exercising your muscles without causing them injury. Most people wrongly presume that if they work out faster, they are burning more calories. Not quite. Pacing yourself effectively will make your abs work harder, yielding better results.A Three-Week Workout PlanIn order to achieve your goal of sculpted abs, continue on with a workout plan over the course of 3 weeks, by gradually increasing your pace. The Perfect Ab Carver Pro comes with a manual that outlines a 3 week work out plan. Along with following this plan, it is imperative that you eat healthy. Remember, if you’re going to burn 400 calories in your workout, you should at least consume 200 calories.Here is the workout plan:Day 1: Keep Limit in mindCarve Straight: 1 set of 10 repsCarve Left: 1 set of 5 repsCarve Right: 1 set of 5 repsDay 2: take the day offDay 3:Carve straight: 3 sets of 10 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 5 repsCarve Right: 3 sets of 5 repsDay 4: take the day offDay 5:Carve straight: 3 sets of 10 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 5 repsCarve Right: 3 sets of 5 repsDay 6: take the day offDay 7:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 10 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 5 repsCarve Right: 3 sets of 5 repsDay 8: take the day offDay 9:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 15 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 8 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 8 repsDay 10: take the day offDay 11:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 15 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 8 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 8 repsDay 12: take the day offDay 13:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 15 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 8 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 8 repsDay 14: take the day offDay 15:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 20 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 10 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 10 repsDay 16: take the day offDay 17:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 20 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 10 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 10 repsDay 18: take the day offDay 19:Carve Straight: 3 sets of 20 repsCarve Left: 3 sets of 10 repsCare Right: 3 sets of 10 repsDay 20: take the day offDay 21: Re-Test Your LimitsCarve Straight: 1 set of 10 repsCarve Left: 1 set of 5 repsCare Right: 1 set of 5 reps[...]- thanks

I ordered this at the end of Oct 2014_ it was only $60 with free s/h then. i would not pay the $80 + that some vendors are charging now.i've been using it a couple of months now- & it's worked wonderfully.  i honestly didn't have very high expectations of this- but i figured i could return it if it sucked.  But it ended up working great.  you've got to follow the instructions. Does NOT get as fizzy/bubbly as store bought- no matter how many times i press the button to carbonate water_ but it does get adequately fizzy_ i would prefer more fizzy/bubble.i've noticed a lot of people who rated this low have been because of user error_ 1 customer complained that he didn't know how to plug it in- & how amazon & sodastream ruined his christmas holiday table- because when he tried to carbonate his wine- it sprayed all over the table.....it states clearly in description & in instructions that this is to be used to carbonate only water----there are even pieces of paper in the included bottles- that you have to pull out to use the bottles- that say-  only carbonate water with this machine....he did manage to figure out how to make it work without plugging it in (because it doesn't plug in)_ he even managed to carbonate with it-  the problem was he tried to carbonate wine instead of water.- i'm sure you've seen similar.it's true that you don't save much, if any money, using this machine/system_ the benefits/pluses of owning it are you don't have to carry cans/bottles to & from the store.  & you don't create as much waste/recycling. you can keep unique flavors at home that you can't find in store.You can save money-if you modify your machine to use other carbonation tanks (which sodastream doesn't want you to do- but lots of people successfully do it w/o problems.  U can also save money if you use other sources for flavors/soda-syrups._ some of the reviews here have mentioned how to make your own syrups or to use brand name soda pop syrups or to use slushy machine syrups, etc._ you can find lots of info by googling what you want to know.you can also save money by shopping at the sodastream website.  they have an outlet/clearance section where they offer syrups for 1/2 off_ they say they're a couple/few months away from expire date- so not to order more than you would use in a couple months.You can also order xtra carbonation tanks from them.  this machine will take the larger 130 size tank-  it's only $50 at sodastream website- plus they have free s/h with $50 purchase___so don't let other vendors try to sell you these 60 size tanks for more than $30 or the 130 size tanks for more than $50_ because you can get them directly from sodastream with free s/h..another benefit is you can make/mix your own flavors_  i add a splash of cream soda to the orange- & it tastes just like a creamsicle or orange push-up pops. you can make your soda weaker/stronger to your taste- with bottled soda from store you have to drink it the way they make it.they say to pour the syrup in the bottle of carbonated water after it's carbonated.  but you risk fizz over- you have to wash the bottle- you risk spilling.- i have a large cup that holds 50 ounces of liquid- i put ice in it- i pour the flavor syrup over the ice- & then i pour the carbonated water from the bottle into the cup- it mixes in the cup as i pour the fizzy water- there's only ever water in the bottle- so i only have to put more water in it - put it back in fridge till my next use.the machine isn't pretty- it's a big chunk of flimsy plastic.  but if you don't move it around a lot or handle it too harshly-- it should last. & if you break the back cover the machine can still be used. if you break part of the side or bottom it can still be used.as long as the top stays in good shape the machine will work- the top parts are where you attach the tank & screw the bottle of water on to carbonate.  if you're crafty you can always decorate the plastic shell- that might be fun.  you can probably also by xtra shells cheap on ebay-

these are the only candy with dark chocolate that i enjoy.  they're even better out of the fridge or freezer. they're the perfect size.they're lower in fat & calories than other candy bars.- & 2 or 3 minis are enough to satisfy your sweet tooth.add one of these to your hot chocolate or coffee_ break up & stir into ice cream_ bake into cookies and/or lava cakes.so good & so many ways to use them.  i've been known to order the 5 pound boxes of these York minis.the only time i've had problems with ordering candy from Amazon was in the warmer months_(melted chocolate & candy)_ & once when a vendor approved by Amazon sent me an expired 5 pound box of York Peppermint Patties._ but Amazon made the situation right_all my best retail experiences have been through Amazon.  & as an Amazon Prime member, the benefits are even better.If Amazon sent me a t-shirt that said, 'I Love Amazon'_ i would wear it.

I don't use it often- but it's a great addition to the Amazon Prime membership.  I didn't mind the recent price increase because of the xtra values/benefits Amazon included in the Prime service.The Prime Video app has always worked perfectly on my pc, android & Iphone__ Amazon does this right

this removed a 6  month old pizza sauce stain out of beige carpet !  i was amazed.the directions say to spray stain  & blot up_ that may work for fresh stains.  but for my old, tomato based stain- i had to spray- scrub with stiff brush- & then go over the area with my carpet cleaner (loaded with just plain water) so that i could rinse & suck up the spray/stain/water_ i imagine you could also use a wet/dry vac___i had dropped a ramekin cup of pizza sauce on the carpet- & it splattered several spots in an area about the size of a bath towel_By my going over it with the bissell carpet cleaner- i was able to rinse the residue out of the carpet & not worry about it attracting new dirt.  the area came perfectly clean & soft.in Nov 2014 i paid just under $8_ plus an extra discount for using 'subscribe & save'__Order SummaryItem(s) Subtotal: $7.99Shipping & Handling: $0.00Subscribe & Save: -$1.20Total before tax: $6.79Estimated tax to be collected: $0.00Grand Total: $6.79& it's a large can- i didn't have to use much- so it will last a long time.  it sprays foamy- so i suppose you could also use this for high traffic areas, pre-treater & small rugs_ not just spots.  i'd also consider using/having a way to rinse with clean water & extract the cleaner/water/stain.i would highly recommend- it worked better than i thought it would.  if you can get this for $10-ish (up or down a couple bucks)- i would consider it a fair/good buy.if this was of any help to you- plz click the button below indicating it was_ thanks

do you love the smell of fall spices?  do you remember taking an orange & punching it full of cloves to make a scented decoration?do you love the smell of cloves as they are baked into a ham?  i'm reminded of all these wonderful memories/scents when i open this jar of sweet clove oil.i bought a 2 oz jar in Sept 2014 for less than $6_ a fair price.  I add a few drop to my humidifier & the sweet/warm/comforting scent of cloves fills the great room.  i imagine you can also use these in your oil/scent pots-warmers.  or even simmer a pan/kettle of water on the stove top & add a few drops- let the scented steam fill the room with the warm/sweet/comforting scent of cloves.the bottle has a sprinkle top- a piece of plastic covers the opening with a tiny hole in the center- so you can turn the bottle over & sprinkle the oil out or let the oil slowly drip out one drop at a time._ you don't have to worry about dropping or spilling & losing all the oil in the bottle- so i like that- cause only a drop will come out at a time.this is a true clove scent- it's well concentrated- so a few drops goes a long way.  you can put a few drops on a cotton ball & leave them in closets/drawers/gym-lockers/shoes/luggage/cars/_ anywhere where you want a warm/comforting scent._this is very  appropriate for the men- it's not fruity or flowery at all- a masculine scent that sorta smells/reminds you of your mom's/grandma's holiday baking/cooking.i imagine you could add this to your body oils/lotions/cremes/body sprays.  add a few drops into your bubble bath. so many possibilities & enough oil to try lots of them.i would recommend this & i would buy this again.- if the price remains fair.if this was of any help- plz click on the button below- thanks

This movie is a comedy- that makes fun of god/devil- religion.  If you can't take a joke- have no sense of humor- or are some right-wing nut job__ you probably won't like this movie__so don't bother.If you like to laugh_ if you enjoy juvenile humor & delinquent behavior_ bad language--- then you will probably like/love this movie.underneath all the vulgarity & ridiculousness is a theme.  neither god nor the devil is guiding our destiny.  we're responsible for the choices we make & whatever consequences those choices lead to.  if there were no god & devil we would be in charge of ourselves.
horrible

2:16 MinsI really like this.  it was $23 when I bought it- less expensive than most toasters.First use was for reheating leftover pizza.  It did an excellent job at reheating the pizza without making it soggy like the microwave does.I put a piece of foil on bottom plate-so I wouldn't have to clean the grill-  the top plate can be locked in any position- so it doesn't touch top of pizza. The bottom of pizza became crispy & the pizza heat all the way thru in just a few minutes. There was enough room for 2  thick, square pieces plus a couple of breadsticks.The instructions say this is not to be used to cook things like steak & burgers.The top plate can be locked in any position between fully opened & closed.The cord can be wound around pegs under bottom plate.There's a clip to lock machine in closed position.It can be stored on side only taking about 5 inches of counter space.Instruction book has a few recipes using tortillas, pizza crust, refrigerator crescent rolls.You can go to Hamilton beach website to register appliance & find more recipes.It comes with a 1 year warranty- but we have to pay for shipping to & from repair center- & if you can buy a new 1 for $25-ish__ it might be cheaper to buy a new one.It's very sturdy/solid- metal & hard plastic. It looks -& feels like it will lasti added a video- if it's of any help in your decision making- plz click the button saying so- thanks

I am a big fan of bluetooth ear buds. I am mostly at home at like to leave my phone or iPad on a counter and go about my business; bluetooth headphones lets me leave the device and still get my music or podcast.These fit well and also come with a couple more fittings for the perfect ear fit. They are easy to sync and the sound is great.

Non-stick pans wear out after awhile; they just do, simple fact. So when this came up for review my son really wanted me to get it for him to try out. He has a couple eggs fried every morning and our other non-stick was beginning to lose its surface into the egg in little black bits.This is a great every morning fry an egg size. The ceramic non-stick is not like that old style non-stick and will not flake off like the others. That's huge! The handle is simple and covered for a little relief from the heat.

THese are a middle of the road quality pair of cycling sun glasses. The think I always like about a pair of inexpensive sun glasses is that you can wear them and if you inadvertantly leave them on the counter of the last store you were in while paying for your items (hypothetically) you aren't out a lot of money.These do a good job of keeping the wind out of my eyes and the UV tint is nice for sunny weather.

I just love Iris. She is a character and her husband is too. I loved seeing the inside of her closets and closets of clothes. Her taste is superbly quirky in the best way. This is a documentary on Iris's life and career.

Okay, not gonna lie, these make nice little snack bowls for human beings too. And since you get an assortment in the package, a few can be for the dog and a few for you.The other way these are handy though, seriously, is that you can tuck one into each vehicle so you are never without a way to give your dog some water. They are smallish and collapse for easy storage. (received for free)
A simple and elegant night gown made of a slinky and a little stretchy fabric. It is smooth and comfortable to wear and fits as expected.

This is a really clever idea. I have reviewed many diffusers which do the same as this but the clever thing here is that it is very compact for storage without the bottle. And when you want to use it, you can use a disposable water bottle- any size. When I plugged it in, it began working immediately and did a great job of putting out steam.I reviewed this for a free trial.

This is a pretty decent coat that I was happy to receive and review for free.The fabric feels like a very lightweight wool which makes it kind of nice if you don't need a heavy peacoat. Its weight is more along the line of a heavy sweater than a coat.The fit is a bit small. I usually wear a medium with plenty of room to spare and this one is snug on me and the sleeves are tight; they fit but it is a form fitting jacket more than loose. It is nicely lined. This will be a great nice looking coat to grab for everyday cool weather.

This is an attractive lamp but you should know this before you purchase:1. The white "wood" is plastic; the company calls it a wood/plastic composite.2. You have to use a screw driver to take the bottom off the light to change the bulb; a bit of a hassle.Things I really like about it:1.It has a fairly bright light but not glaring2. The on/off switch is on the cord3. the silvery mesh inside the carved plastic makes the light even more lovelyI was happy to receive this for free

I count on these mesh bags to keep my underwear from getting tangled up with the rest of the wash. The three sizes lets me use the right size depending on the amount. They are also a great way to wash nylons and keep them from getting snagged or stretched.

These are really great for travel these days if, like me, you want to travel with just carry on luggage. This helps to compact your clothing so you can fit a little more in. There are two ways to seal it- you can attempt to get as much air out by smashing it and then ziplocing it shut. But the most effective way is with a vacuum suction in the provided nozzle hole.These are also great for storing out of season clothing keeping them dust free. I was super happy to get these for free.

A good price for a good lock. This is a small lock (1" X 1") and can be used obvioulsy for things besides just travel. It is lightweight. The lock comes with 000 as the combination and you can reset it with your own 3 numbers. The pink on the edges is silicone and gives the added benefit of a good grip when opening the lock. *received for free

These are very comfortable with good padding. The blue lights up. The sound quality is good and the microphone can fold up on the head band when not in use. It plugs into the USB outlet on your device.

This is a simple sweet little bowl, clear glass with holly embossed all around the side. The lip has a gold finish. The base is heavy sturdy and the sides are delicate.I could not tell by the photo what size it is and was surprised at how small it actually is. It holds 2 cups of liquid. It would make a nice little candy dish for Christmans.

I am a big fan of bluetooth ear buds. I am mostly at home at like to leave my phone or iPad on a counter and go about my business; bluetooth headphones lets me leave the device and still get my music or podcast.These fit well and also come with a couple more fittings for the perfect ear fit. They are easy to sync and the sound is great.

For the price, I give this 5 stars. That said, it is a leaker so have a plate or something beneath its nose to catch the drips. I like the on/off switch so I can keep it plugged in but simply turned off. The kickstand is a great feature.It heats quickly and I am really glad for the glue sticks included with- long and skinny.And I love the size. For most little craft pojects I only need a gun this size.

My husband wears boxers (the tight kind like these) so yes, he would be happy to review them for free:)They are a nice silky feel and a nice change from the cotton boxers. He is a big 6'6" guy and the Large fit him perfectly; it is the same size he wears for other boxer brands.

If you scan through my reviews, you will see I am a sucker for solar lights. So, uh, yes, I gladly reviewed this for free.I love that i can string them in trees and on bannisters and on bushes far away from an outlet outdoors and then will faithfully come on at dark and go off in daylight. And all day they charge so they are ready to light up again that night.These are a fun icicle shape and are more fun to have in a bush closer to the house so people can actually see the shape of them.

This is the perfect little bell for a kid's bike. It is compact and has enough "ding" volume to get people out of your way on the bike path.It fits on a regular size handle bar and screws down to tighten on.
The gloves are heavy, the grip is sure, the inside is soft fleece, they are a good work glove.My husband is 6'6" and the Large fits him perfectly.

My husband already has a King Will ring and it is amazing quality.So when they wondered if I would like to receive on for free, I was happy to. This is such a fantastic ring- tungsten heft and shiny middle with burnished edges.Update: My husband has been wearing this for a few months and it still looks perfect, no scratches or tarnishing.

Yes, it's true there are 120 colors/shades in this set- more than I will ever need. When I showed this to my 18 year old daughter, she was thrilled; she had been wanting this set so I gave it to her to test out. I received it for free.She is very happy with the myriad of colors and shades of colors. You get an amazing amount of eye shadow for a great price.It washes off very easily. It does not come with applicators.

This is a well made heavy magnifying glass that magnifies by 2.5 The rosewood handle is lovely, the glass is perfect and it is held in place by a heavy metal rim. It came securely wrapped and actually nicer looking than the photo.

This is a great gift idea to make someone feel pampered. 100% silk pillowcase comes in a great gift giving box and included is a little mesh bag with a cocoon from a silk worm and a few colorful swatches of silk. The pillowcase has a concealed zipper closure which is terrific because I think my pillow would slide out of the case because of the silkiness of it.It fits a standard pillow and I received it for free.

For the price this is a fair monocular. It will be going to my 11 year old grandson and it is perfect for both of us- the price point for me and the better than junk quality for him.It has a nice heavy quality feel to it. It is adjustable by turning the middle grooved piece for focusing. It has a nice carrying strap and a case for carrying it in.I received this for free.

I am conflicted about this review. Yes, the vacuum is lightweight but the heaviest part is the unit above that you have to support throughout vacuuming so it seems heavier than it really is.It is a fairly compact vacuum but there is no way to get it to stand on its own- the brush unit does not lock into place for stand-up mode; it just hangs limply. Which is why, I discovered, there is an included hanging hook- because that is the only way to store it.I like the nozzle attachment but there is no where that it can attach to the unit so when I need it, I have to run and fetch from wherever I last left it.I do like the extra long cord and I like the cloth bottomed unit for cleaning my hardwood floors. And I also really like the easy dump debris canister. And for a more thorough cleaning, the filter comes out from the top of the recepticle.I also like that I can take off the extender, put on the nozzle and use it like a small power vacuum for edges and crevices.

I am giving this a five star rating because I think for the price point, it is a lovely bracelet. It does not scream amazing quality, but the price is low enough to just put it on and wear it any and everywhere without worry of losing it. With that said, it does have a reliable clasp and I have never had it fall off.It looks lovely and comes in various crystal colors. I received for free the clear crystal bracelet and like it a lot.

This is a sweet little set for a 1- 3 month old (roughly). The yarn is very soft. The set is just as shown in the photo. The storefront hypes this as photography outfit, but really it is an outfit worth having your baby wear any time- not just for a photo session.

Solar powered is great for those places far out in the yard that you want a little twinkly lights but have no outlet. These come on at dusk and go off as the sun comes up. Perfect.This is a long set and I was thrilled to be able to string them all the way down my hall on the bannister that overlooks the living room. The one thing about the copper string is that it tangles easily when you are trying to string it but that is also what makes it so beautiful- the delicate copper wires.

This is our second projector and the thing we noticed first off about this one is its compact size. It is so easily transportable. It is also very easy to set up. It has its own sound and it is pretty decent sound but you can also plug it into speakers.The one thing we noticed is that the lumens require a darker room than we normally have to have for our stronger projector.

First of all the best thing about this headset is that it is intuitive so it is easy to use. Next of all, my son likes to "plug in" while some of his friends prefer bluetooth; this set allows for either so it's your choice preference.It is a modular unit so if you don't want/need to use the microphone you don't have to hook it in making the unit less cumbersome for those times.It has a good sound and the noise canceling is good too.

It's been told for so long that a new version needs to keep the story true and make the setting, the characters, the costumes amazing. This was just sort of "meh" in that way and so just 4 stars instead of 5

This is easy to sync and the sound is full and rich. It is a compact size for easy transport but still has great sound. Full up volume is not overwhelming but it works well for a large room setting. The price is very fair for the unit.I received this free.

I wanted to review this watch (for free) because I was hoping it would be adorable and wonderful for my granddaughter. It is! It is a nice small face appropiate to a child's wrist size and a sturdy rubbery watch band to withstand water and wipe clean.The flower in the center rotates 360˚ for marking the seconds. I like that the watch displays all the numbers (as opposed to just the 12, 3, 6, 9 or tick marks) It makes it easier for a beginner time teller to figure out the time.

Who wouldn't want a bulb with three starry crown inside?! So, yes, I agreed to review this for free. I put it in an overhanging light where we read at night and when you look at it there it is all starry lights brilliantly shining at us.If you have bulbs that are visible through a glass shade or just haning bare, you should think about buying this because it just adds a little pizzaz to the lighting.

I was super excited to receive this roll of parchment paper (for free) because I use it as my base for my oil paint palette. Well, and baking too. So yes, I am a fan of parchment paper. This is nice quality, nice weight and I think, a fair price. The only problem I had with it is the packaging is not exactly self-explanatory so I could not figure out how to get the paper to roll out without it scraping the serrated edge.

I love the grater/julienne tool; it makes julienne cukes, carrots and other vegetables quickly and easily. The potato masher is okay but the surface for mashing is a bit small. This would be a great set for a small apartment size kitchen. I received these for free.

Just a good honest jump rope. Perfect for the fun of it or for honest to goodness exercising. It is 9.8 feet long and can be used for up to 5.9 foot person. The handles are a nice soft foam grip. I received this for free and will be sticking it in my granddaughter's stocking for Christmas.

These were absolutely fantastic, great sound, great volume, nice fit. For 7 days. After that the left earbud just quit; no jiggling, shaking, or cajoling the wires to reconnect or something would do it and the left earbud gets no sound.This is way too much money for a set of earbuds to fail that fast, (though I got mine for free to review.)

So, you're looking at this title wondering, "Did she accidentally fall into being a feminist?" "Did she wake up and discover she is a feminist and needs out?" The title is ambiguous, so allow me; Courtney Reissig is a "complimentarian," as opposed to "egalitarian." So that's the premise for the book.Before I get all sorts of ugly comments and shoved in the "man-hater" box let me state that  I am a stay-at-home  mother of seven who managed to homeshcool them all to amazing success in the arts and sciences. I married at 19 and 35 years later am still smitten with that guy.Reissig has nothing new to say. These complementarian/egalitarian camps have had their tents pitched for a very long time and Reissig brings the same interpretation and nuances to the same verses that every other complementarian has brought. But she is sweet about it.Nothing new here right down to the single curse for Adam- haard work, and the double (?) curse for women- childbearing and wresting the pants from the man (which by the way, wouldn't that be actually a curse for the man- always trying to keep his pants?)Reissig also spends quite a bit of time trying to convince women that "helper" isn't that bad, that really it's a wonderful stint. And honestly, it is but I find it odd that books and books have been written about how gosh dang wonderful it is to be the "helper" the "submitter" like they're trying to convince themselves of it too. And that always rings hollow to me; that something seemingly so wonderful and beautiful would have to be sort of forced and cajoled on the reader.I did appreciate this, "In my life, my problem was that I was trying to master a stereotype rather than trying to love my husband. I was trying to fit into a box of my own making, not seeking to serve the husband God had given me. Helping my husband looks different from how my friend might help her husband."That is ultimately why it is so impossible to split the Christian world into two camps- complementarian/egalitarian- It does not/ should not look the same in every marriage.Reissig does not plow any new ground and in fact simply trundles forward the same divide that has been debated for ever and ever. She just does it nicely. And maybe scuffles the line a little bit.

This Kitty Sewing Kit by WooCrafts is not only handy for mending torn items, it also makes me smile every time I look at it!The front of the  4 1/4" x 5" x 1"  Too Cute Leather Case is Nicely Detailed with the Kitty's Eyes, Nose, Whiskers and Pretty Pink Bow, while the Backside of the Case is plain white.
